original_title: Jetzt bringen wir unsere Männer um
overview: Two humiliated wives decide to kill their husbands - each other's. But despite an ingenious plan, they fail to implement it. Now they decide to turn the tables: they want to appear as if they were the victims of assassination attempts by their husbands. The murderous castling really does go as planned, but then the men suddenly change their plan.
title: Jetzt bringen wir unsere Männer um
